Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Deep goblet with a small flat base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The pink-buff coloured interior surface has been carefully polished. The exterior surface, which bears a red slip, has been vertically burnished. Very few traces of this burnish are left. Some black patches were created by fire clouding.
